movie.title: Passengers
movie.actors: Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt, Michael Sheen, Laurence Fishburne
movie.plot: A spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet and transporting thousands of people has a malfunction in its sleep chambers. As a result, two passengers are awakened 90 years early.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 1 win & 8 nominations.

movie.title: The StarWars Adventures
movie.actors: Ron Arthurs, Johnathan Beetles, Jake Gosden, Matt Jackson
movie.plot: After splitting the Battalion into four companies, Thunder Company, under the command of Captain Mandeville,was sent to investigate Decks 300 to 600. To achieve this in the quickest ...

movie.title: The Cure
movie.actors: Brad Renfro, Aeryk Egan, Delphine French, Mona Powell
movie.plot: Erik, a loner, finds a friend in Dexter, an eleven-year-old boy with AIDS. They vow to find a cure for AIDS together and save Dexter's life in an eventful summer.
